greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of permutations of 8 copies of 1..n with no element equal to another within a distance of 1.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..71
formula: a(n) = Integral_{0..infinity} (Sum_{k=1..8} (-1)^(8-k) * binomial(7, 8-k) * x^k/k!)^n * exp(-x) dx.
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Nov 28 2018
